revisions.rev:
{{Infobox Kids' Choice Awards | name = Nickelodeon's 24th Annual | image = KCA 2011 LOGO.png | caption = Kids' Choice Awards 2011 Official Logo | network = [[Nickelodeon (TV channel)|Nickelodeon]] | date = April 2, 2011 | site = [[University of Southern California|USC]] [[Galen Center]], [[University Park, Los Angeles]] | host = [[Jack Black]] | company = Bob Bain Productions
Nickelodeon Productions | distributor = [[Nickelodeon (TV channel)|Nickelodeon]] | executive_producer = Bob Bain
Marjorie Cohn
Paula Kaplan | slime stunts = Monster Truck leap over the Nickelodeon Blimp and into slime | producer = Paul Flattery | director = [[Beth McCarthy-Miller]] | duration = 90 minutes (8-9:30 p.m. ET/PT) | rating = 7.3 million | prev_season = [[2010 Kids' Choice Awards]] | next_season = [[2012 Kids' Choice Awards]] | preshow = ''Countdown to Kids' Choice!'' | preshow_host = [[Jeff Sutphen]]
Aaron Fresh
[[Daniella Monet]]
and [[Noah Munck]] }} '''Nickelodeon's 24th Annual [[Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards|Kids' Choice Awards]]''' were held on April 2, 2011 at 8 p.m. ET[http://www.nick.com/kids-choice-awards/news/jack-black-host-2011-kids-choice-awards.html 2011 Kids' Choice Awards Host Announced!!!], Nick.com, February 10, 2011 at the [[Galen Center]] at the [[University of Southern California]] in [[Los Angeles]]'s [[University Park, Los Angeles|University Park]] neighborhood due to renovations disallowing use of traditional venue [[Pauley Pavilion]] until at least 2013. [[Jack Black]] returned as host for the third time since 2006.Annie Yuan, [http://www.hollywoodreporter.com/news/jack-black-host-kids-choice-98913 Jack Black to Host Kids' Choice Awards for Third Time], ''Hollywood Reporter'', February 11, 2011 The 2011 telecast was the first Kids' Choice Awards to take place in the month of April since 2006, as the previous four Kids' Choice telecasts from 2007 to 2010 were held on the last Saturday in March. Nominees were announced on February 10, 2011 for twenty categories. During the show, the Big Green Help Award was presented to [[Justin Timberlake]], an honor given each year. More than 200 million record-breaking votes were casted for this year's 20-category awards. Musical performances during the awards telecast included [[Big Time Rush (band)|Big Time Rush]], who performed their single "[[Boyfriend (Big Time Rush song)|Boyfriend]]" from their debut album ''[[B.T.R. (album)|B.T.R.]]'' with a surprise appearance by Snoop Dogg, who was slimed at the end of the song. (This marked the second time a Nickelodeon act performed during the actual Kids' Choice telecast after [[The Naked Brothers Band (TV series)|The Naked Brothers Band]] in [[2008 Kids' Choice Awards|2008]]); [[The Black Eyed Peas]] and [[Willow Smith]] also performed during the awards telecast, and each sang a medley of some of their 2 latest hit singles.{{cite web|url=http://www.people.com/people/article/0,,20476559,00.html|title=Willow Smith to Perform at Kids' Choice Awards|last=Byrne|first=Alla|publisher=[[People (magazine)|''People'']]|date=March 28, 2011|accessdate=March 29, 2011}} For the third year in a row, the award show was preceded by a ''Countdown to Kidsâ Choice!'' pre-show telecast, which aired live from 7 to 8 p.m. ET as wraparound segments during regularly scheduled programming; the preshow was hosted by ''[[BrainSurge]]'' host [[Jeff Sutphen]], ''[[Victorious]]'' cast member [[Daniella Monet]], ''[[iCarly]]'' cast member [[Noah Munck]] and recording artist Aaron Fresh.[http://www.tvguide.com/News/Train-Kids-Choice-1031188.aspx Exclusive: Train to Perform at Nickelodeon's Kids' Choice Awards], ''[[TV Guide]]'', March 29, 2011. [[Train (band)|Train]] performed their 2010 hit single "[[Hey, Soul Sister]]" during the pre-show; [[Victoria Justice]], who was also a presenter during the awards telecast, performed the single "Beggin' on Your Knees" from the upcoming soundtrack to her Nickelodeon series ''Victorious'' during the pre-show. The song was also featured during a new episode of ''Victorious'', also titled "Begginâ on Your Kneesâ, which aired immediately following the awards at 9:35 p.m. ET/PT. Like the previous year, Nickelodeon's sister channels [[TeenNick]] and [[Nicktoons (TV channel)|Nicktoons]] suspended regular programming during the 95-minute duration of the award show, allowing viewers to see the awards. A portion of [[Figueroa Street]] and [[Jefferson Boulevard]] fronting Galen Center was blocked off for the "orange carpet", a stage and the [[grandstand]] for fans to watch the broadcasting of the pre-show. On April 1, Nickelodeon reported the slime was stolen as part of the [[April Fool's Day]] joke.[http://www.nick.com/kids-choice-awards/news/ THE KCA SLIME IS MISSING!!!], Kids' Choice Awards 2011 News, April 1, 2011 As with previous years, voting took place online via the [http://www.nick.com/kca11 program's official webpage] and [http://m.nick.com/kca11 mobile site] beginning on March 7, along with an [[iPhone]]/[[iPad]] application made specifically for the awards as introduced in the previous year. In addition, the network's [[Facebook]] page also allowed voting via the Facebook accounts of 'fans' of the channel for the first time. ==Presenters and performers, and stunts for KCA 2011== {{Col-begin}} {{Col-2}} ===Hosts=== * [[Jack Black]] * Pre-show hosts: Aaron Fresh, [[Daniella Monet]], [[Noah Munck]] and [[Jeff Sutphen]] ===Presenters=== {{col-begin}} {{col-2}} * [[Russell Brand]] * [[Nick Cannon]] * [[Miranda Cosgrove]] * [[Rosario Dawson]] * [[Randy Jackson]] * [[Joe Jonas]] * [[Victoria Justice]] * [[Kim Kardashian|Kim]] and [[Kourtney Kardashian]] * [[Heidi Klum]] * [[Jane Lynch]] {{col-2}} * [[Taylor Momsen]] * [[Cory Monteith]] * [[Keke Palmer]] * [[Rico Rodriguez II|Rico Rodriguez]] * [[Jason Segel]] * [[Steven Tyler]] * [[Sofia Vergara]] * [[Shaun White]] * [[Big Show (wrestler)|The Big Show]] {{col-end}} ===Performers=== * [[Big Time Rush (band)|Big Time Rush]] â "[[Boyfriend (Big Time Rush song)|Boyfriend]]" (feat. [[Snoop Dogg]]) * [[The Black Eyed Peas]] â "[[I Gotta Feeling]]" with Jack Black, "[[The Time (Dirty Bit)]]", "[[Just Can't Get Enough (The Black Eyed Peas song)|Just Can't Get Enough]]" * [[Willow Smith]] â "[[21st Century Girl (Willow Smith song)|21st Century Girl]]", "[[Whip My Hair]]" * [[Victoria Justice]] â "[[Beggin' On Your Knees]]" (Pre-Show)[http://www.nick.com/kids-choice-awards/news/ Victoria Justice Performing at the 2011 KCAs'!], Kids' Choice Awards 2011 News, March 11, 2011 * [[Train (band)|Train]] â "[[Hey, Soul Sister]]" (Pre-Show)[http://www.tvguide.com/News/Train-Kids-Choice-1031188.aspx Exclusive: Train to Perform at Nickelodeon's Kids' Choice Awards] ===Announcer=== * [[Tom Kenny]] ===Special appearances=== * [[Britney Spears]][http://perezhilton.com/2011-03-16-britney-spears-promotion-schedule-for-femme-fatale Britney's Amping Up The Promotion For Femme Fatale] only appeared in the skit when she was calling security on Po from ''[[Kung Fu Panda]]''. * [[Devon Bostick]] (Rodrick from ''[[Diary of a Wimpy Kid]]'' 1 and 2) appeared at the pre-show signing an autograph and in the audience at the awards. * [[Jim Carrey]] appeared at the end of the show in a giant hot-air balloon. * The cast of ''[[House of Anubis]]'' appeared in the ''Countdown to Kid's Choice''. * Po the Panda Bear from ''Kung Fu Panda'' (voiced by Jack Black) appeared in the audience at least three times performing in mini-skits with Britney Spears. * The cast of ''[[Victorious]]'' appeared in ''Countdown to Kid's Choice''. * Blu and Jewel from ''[[Rio (film)|Rio]]'' (voiced by [[Jesse Eisenberg]] and [[Anne Hathaway (actress)|Anne Hathaway]]) appeared in the backstage at the awards. ===Nicktoon appearances=== The following characters (except Po) announce certain unseen awards between commercials. * ''[[Kung Fu Panda]] & [[Kung Fu Panda 2]]'' â Po * ''[[The Penguins of Madagascar]]'' â The Penguins and King Julien * ''[[T.U.F.F. Puppy]]'' â Agents Dudley Puppy and Kitty Katswell * ''[[Fairly OddParents]]'' â Cosmo, Wanda and Poof (in CGI) * ''[[Planet Sheen]]'' â Sheen and Nesmith * ''[[Rio (film)|Rio]]'' â Blu and Jewel (not Nicktoons but to promote their movie) * ''[[Monkey Quest]]'' â Monkeys * ''[[Fanboy and Chum Chum]]'' â Fanboy and Chum Chum ==Categories== Winners are in bold. 1 Denotes a first time Kids' Choice Award nominee in the individual category.
2 Denotes winner of 2010 Kids' Choice Award in the individual category.
Note: Does not apply to the "Favorite Movie", "Favorite Animated Movie", "Favorite TV Sidekick", "Favorite Buttkicker", "Favorite Song" or the "Favorite Video Game" categories. ===Television=== {{col-begin}} {{col-2}} ====Favorite TV Show==== * ''[[Big Time Rush]]'' 1 * '''''[[iCarly]]''''' 2 '''(Winner, 3rd time in a row)''' * ''[[The Suite Life on Deck]]'' * ''[[Wizards of Waverly Place]]'' ====Favorite Reality Show==== * '''''[[American Idol]]''''' 2 '''(Winner)''' * ''[[America's Funniest Home Videos]]'' 1 * ''[[America's Got Talent]]'' 1 * ''[[Wipeout (2008 U.S. game show)|Wipeout]]'' ====Favorite Television Actor==== * [[Joe Jonas]] for ''[[Jonas L.A.]]'' as [[List of Jonas L.A. characters#Joe Lucas|Joe Lucas]] * [[Nick Jonas]] for ''[[Jonas L.A.]]'' as [[Jonas L.A.#Main characters|Nick Lucas]] * [[Cole Sprouse]] for ''[[The Suite Life on Deck]]'' as [[Cody Martin]] * '''[[Dylan Sprouse]]''' for ''[[The Suite Life on Deck]]'' as [[Zack Martin]] '''(Winner, 3rd time in a row)''' {{col-2}} ====Favorite Television Actress==== * [[Miranda Cosgrove]] for ''[[iCarly]]'' as [[Carly Shay#Carly Shay|Carly Shay]] * [[Miley Cyrus]] for ''[[Hannah Montana]]'' as [[Miley Stewart]]/[[Miley Stewart#Hannah Montana|Hannah Montana]] * '''[[Selena Gomez]]''' for ''[[Wizards of Waverly Place]] '' as [[Alex Russo]] (Winner, 3rd time in a row) * [[Victoria Justice]] for ''[[Victorious]]'' as [[Tori Vega#Main characters|Tori Vega]]1 ====Favorite TV Sidekick (new category)==== * [[David Henrie]] for ''[[Wizards of Waverly Place]]'' as [[Justin Russo (Wizards of Waverly Place)|Justin Russo]] * '''[[Jennette McCurdy]]''' for ''[[iCarly]]'' as [[Sam Puckett]] '''(Winner)''' * [[Noah Munck]] for ''[[iCarly]]'' as [[iCarly|Gibby Gibson]] * [[Brenda Song]] for ''[[The Suite Life on Deck]]'' as [[London Tipton]] ====Favorite Cartoon==== * ''[[The Penguins of Madagascar]]'' * ''[[Phineas and Ferb]]'' * ''[[Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated]]'' 1 * '''''[[SpongeBob SquarePants]]''''' 2 '''(Winner, 3rd time in a row)''' {{col-end}} ===Film=== {{col-begin}} {{col-2}} ====Favorite Movie==== * ''[[Alice in Wonderland (2010 film)|Alice in Wonderland]]'' * ''[[Diary of a Wimpy Kid (film)|Diary of a Wimpy Kid]]'' * ''[[Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows â Part 1|Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows - Part 1]]'' * '''''[[The Karate Kid (2010 film)|The Karate Kid]]''''' '''(Winner)''' ====Favorite Movie Actor==== * [[Jack Black]] as [[Lemuel Gulliver]] for ''[[Gulliver's Travels (2010 film)|Gulliver's Travels]]'' * '''[[Johnny Depp]]''' as [[Mad Hatter]] for ''[[Alice in Wonderland (2010 film)|Alice in Wonderland]]'' '''(Winner)''' * [[Dwayne Johnson]] as Derek Thompson/Tooth Fairy for ''[[Tooth Fairy (film)|Tooth Fairy]]'' * [[Jaden Smith]] 1 as Dre Parker for ''[[The Karate Kid (2010 film)|The Karate Kid]]'' ====Favorite Movie Actress==== * '''[[Miley Cyrus]]''' as Ronnie Miller for ''[[The Last Song (film)|The Last Song]]'' '''(Winner, 2nd time in a row)''' * [[Ashley Judd]] 1 as Carly for ''[[Tooth Fairy (film)|Tooth Fairy]]'' * [[Kristen Stewart]] as [[Bella Swan]] for ''[[The Twilight Saga: Eclipse]]'' * [[Emma Watson]]1 as [[Hermione Granger]] for ''[[Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows â Part 1|Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows - Part 1]]'' {{col-2}} ====Favorite Animated Movie==== * '''''[[Despicable Me]]''''' '''(Winner)''' * ''[[How to Train Your Dragon (film)|How to Train Your Dragon]]'' * ''[[Shrek Forever After]]'' * ''[[Toy Story 3]]'' ====Favorite Voice From an Animated Movie==== * [[Tim Allen]] as [[Buzz Lightyear]] (''[[Toy Story 3]]'') * [[Cameron Diaz]] as [[Princess Fiona]] (''[[Shrek Forever After]]'') * [[Tom Hanks]] as [[Woody (Toy Story)|Woody]] (''[[Toy Story 3]]'') * '''[[Eddie Murphy]]''' as [[Donkey (Shrek)|Donkey]] (''[[Shrek Forever After]]'') '''(Winner)''' ====Favorite Buttkicker==== * [[Steve Carell]] as Gru for ''[[Despicable Me]]'' * '''[[Jackie Chan]]''' as Mr. Han for ''[[The Karate Kid (2010 film)|The Karate Kid]]'' '''(Winner)''' * [[Robert Downey Jr.]] as [[Tony Stark]]/[[Iron Man]] for ''[[Iron Man 2]]'' * [[Will Ferrell]] as Megamind for ''[[Megamind]]'' {{col-end}} ===Music=== {{col-begin}} {{col-2}} ====Favorite Music Group==== * [[Big Time Rush (band)|Big Time Rush]]1 * '''[[The Black Eyed Peas]]''' 2 '''(Winner, 2nd time in a row)''' * [[Jonas Brothers]] * [[Lady Antebellum]]1 ====Favorite Male Singer==== * '''[[Justin Bieber]]''' '''(Winner)''' * [[Jay-Z]] 2 1 * [[Bruno Mars]]1 * [[Usher Raymond|Usher]] {{col-2}} ====Favorite Female Singer==== * [[Miley Cyrus]] * [[Selena Gomez]] 1 * '''[[Katy Perry]]''' 1 '''(Winner)''' * [[Taylor Swift]] ====Favorite Song==== * "'''''[[Baby (Justin Bieber song)|Baby]] feat. [[Ludacris]]'''''" by [[Justin Bieber]] '''(Winner)''' * "''[[California Gurls]] feat. [[Snoop Dogg]]''" by [[Katy Perry]] * "''[[Hey, Soul Sister]]''" by [[Train (band)|Train]] * "''[[Mine (Taylor Swift song)|Mine]]''" by [[Taylor Swift]] {{col-end}} ===Sports=== {{col-begin}} {{col-2}} ====Favorite Male Athlete==== * [[Peyton Manning]] * '''[[Shaquille O'Neal]]''' '''(Winner)''' * [[Michael Phelps]] * [[Shaun White]] {{col-2}} ====Favorite Female Athlete==== * [[Danica Patrick]] * '''[[Lindsey Vonn]]'''1 '''(Winner)''' * [[Serena Williams]] * [[Venus Williams]] {{col-end}} ===Other categories=== {{col-begin}} {{col-2}} ====Big Help Award==== * [[Justin Timberlake]]Dahvi Shira, [http://www.people.com/people/article/0,,20477208,00.html Justin Timberlake To Be Honored at Kids' Choice Awards] ''People'', March 29, 2011 ====Favorite Book==== * '''''[[Diary of a Wimpy Kid (series)|Diary of a Wimpy Kid]]''''' '''(Winner, 2nd time in a row)''' * ''[[Dork Diaries]]''1 * ''[[Vampire Academy series]]''1 * ''[[Witch and Wizard]]''1 {{col-2}} ====Favorite Video Game==== * '''''[[Just Dance 2 (video game)|Just Dance 2]]''''' '''(Winner)''' * ''[[Mario vs. Donkey Kong: Mini-Land Mayhem]]'' * ''[[Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit (2010 video game)|Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit]]'' * ''[[Super Mario Galaxy 2]]'' ===Arm Fart Hall of Fame (new category)=== * [[Kaley Cuoco]] * '''[[Josh Duhamel]]''' '''(Winner)''' * [[Kevin James (actor)|Kevin James]] {{col-end}} ==Events within the show== ===Slime stunts=== A giant monster truck jumps over a 50-foot Nickelodeon blimp award into a pool of slime. Hosted by [[Big Show (wrestler)|Big Show]]. ===Slimed celebrities=== * [[Jack Black]] â Black was slimed near the end of the program during a special appearance by Jim Carrey, who himself was slimed while in a hot air balloon-shaped apparatus. * [[Russell Brand]] â This was not a planned sliming, but Brand and Rico Rodriguez had slime flicked at them by audience members who were slimed by Johnny Depp, following his acceptance of his Favorite Movie Actor award. * [[Nick Cannon]] â Collateral slime from Heidi Klum. * [[Jim Carrey]] â Carrey made a special cameo appearance near the end of the program, and was slimed while in a hot air balloon-shaped apparatus. This is also his 2nd sliming since his big sliming at the 2003 KCA's. * [[Johnny Depp]] â Depp was not slimed himself, though he slimed several young audience members during his acceptance of his Favorite Movie Actor award. * [[Snoop Dogg]] â Snoop Dogg was slimed at the end of a performance of the single "Boyfriend" by Big Time Rush, in which the rapper also performed as well. * [[Kaley Cuoco]] â During the Arm Fart Hall of Fame to help win the contest. * [[Josh Duhamel]] â Duhamel was showered with slime while sitting on a throne, during his acceptance of the viewer-voted celebrity "Arm Fart Hall of Fame" award. * Jewel and Blu (animated, from ''[[Rio (film)|Rio]]'') â From backstage, someone spilled slime on Jewel. She shakes some slime off and landed on Blu's eyes, making him see a girl's blue high heel, mistaking him for Jewel, who jokingly leads him off to get his eyes checked. * [[Heidi Klum]] â Klum was slimed by an envelope intended to reveal the winner of the Favorite TV Actress award (which went to [[Selena Gomez]] for her role in the Disney Channel series ''[[Wizards of Waverly Place]]''). * [[Rico Rodriguez II|Rico Rodriguez]] â This was not a planned sliming, but Rodriguez and Russell Brand had slime flicked at them by audience members who were slimed by Johnny Depp, following his acceptance of his Favorite Movie Actor award. Beforehand, Brand had "scolded" the audience for the mess caused by Depp's sliming. * [[Jason Segel]] â Segel was slimed by co-presenter Jane Lynch (in an homage to a scene from the pilot episode of the Fox series ''[[Glee (TV series)|Glee]]''), in which Lynch dumped a cup filled with slime on Segel's head. * Po (animated, from ''[[Kung Fu Panda]]'' and ''[[Kung Fu Panda 2]]'') â Jack Black sends down the slime on his character and Po shouted, "Awesome!" and returned to his ancient cartoon China, as stated by Jack Black. ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.nick.com/kids-choice-awards/nominees/ The Winners] * [[Nick.com|Nick.com's]] [http://www.nick.com/kids-choice-awards Official KCA 2011 site] {{KCA}} [[Category:2011 music awards|Kids' Choice Awards]] [[Category:Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards]] [[nl:Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards 2011]] [[pl:Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards 2011]] [[pt:Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards 2011]] [[ru:2011 Kidsâ Choice Awards]] [[es:Anexo:Nickelodeon's Kids Choice Awards 2011]]
